title: Her Deadly Touch
description: This story picks up where FOREIGN EXCHANGE, left off.A glorious trip to London, drinking her way from one pub to another, was how it was supposed to be. A frolic through London's best pubs. However, it turned out to be anything but.She didn't know, she couldn't have known what was in store for her. Monique had no way to escape! From suffering at the hands of monsters, she was going to learn how to dish it out, as well.Could she learn in time? Would her agony prevent her from applying what she was taught so brutally? Or was it already too late for Monique?Monique's only hope was to use her DEADLY TOUCH to survive her summer or Hell! If it's not too late, that is!
author: Kim Hardwick
